briefTitle: Online Patient Navigation Program for Patients with Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Online Patient Navigation Program for Timely Access to Supportive Care Services Among Patients with Breast Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, Supportive Care in Cancer, Patient Navigation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female sex
* Age ≥18 years
* Diagnosis of non-metastatic breast cancer
* Internet access at home or in their mobile phone
* Availability to answer the study surveys
* Provision of signed informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Disease recurrence
* Inability to read or write
